A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Gets off to a bumpy start\, but once the film clicks into gear it roars ahead and never stops. Unlike the Force Awakens\, this is a truly evolutionary Star Wars\, building on what's been established in the previous movies while avoiding the temptation to peddle in recycled material. The film introduces new ideas to the familiar story of good vs evil while retaining that authentic Star Wars magic.
